item.title: Tour de Spring Boot: DI meets CoC
item.description: I started using Spring framework back to 2009 or so to develop few demos for European projects. Most of these projects featured several Web services some of which share back-end databases and some need to talk with external services or WS-BPEL business processes, and so on.
